  4    @author  Jules Bergmann, Don McCoy

  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Operation counts for vector, matrix 
  7                              and signal-processing functions.

 11#ifndef VSIP_CORE_OPS_INFO_HPP
 12#define VSIP_CORE_OPS_INFO_HPP
 13
 14#include <complex>
 15#include <string>
 16#include <sstream>
 17#include <vsip/core/math_enum.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/length.hpp>
 20#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
 21
 22namespace vsip
 23{
 24namespace impl
 25{
 26
 27template <typename T>
 28struct Ops_info
 29{
 30  static unsigned int const div = 1;
 31  static unsigned int const sqr = 1;
 32  static unsigned int const mul = 1;
 33  static unsigned int const add = 1;
 34  static unsigned int const mag = 1;
 35};
 36
 37template <typename T>
 38struct Ops_info<std::complex<T> >
 39{
 40  static unsigned int const div = 6 + 3 + 2; // mul + add + div
 41  static unsigned int const sqr = 2 + 1;     // mul + add
 42  static unsigned int const mul = 4 + 2;     // mul + add
 43  static unsigned int const add = 2;
 44  static unsigned int const mag = 2 + 1 + 1; // 2*mul + add + sqroot
 45};
 46
 47
 48template <typename T> 
 49struct Desc_datatype    { static char const * value() { return "I"; } };
 50
 51#define VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE(T, VALUE)		\
 52template <>					\
 53struct Desc_datatype<T> { static char const * value() { return VALUE; } };
 54
 55VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE(float,                "S");
 56VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE(double,               "D");
 57VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE(std::complex<float>,  "C");
 58VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE(std::complex<double>, "Z");
 59
 60#undef VSIP_IMPL_DESC_DATATYPE
 61
 62
 63
 64
 65namespace fft
 66{
 67
 68template <typename I, typename O>
 69struct Op_count
 70{ 
 71  static length_type value(length_type len)
 72  { 
 73    length_type ops = static_cast<length_type>(
 74      5 * len * std::log((float)len) / std::log(2.f));
 75    if (sizeof(I) != sizeof(O)) ops /= 2;
 76    return ops;
 77  }
 78};
 79
 80
 81template <int D, typename I, typename O>
 82struct Description
 83{ 
 84  static std::string tag(bool is_fftm, Domain<D> const &dom, int dir, 
 85    return_mechanism_type rm, dimension_type axis)
 86  {
 87    std::ostringstream   st;
 88    st << (is_fftm ? "Fftm " : "Fft ") 
 89       << (is_fftm ? (axis == 1 ? "row " : "col ") : "")
 90       << (dir == -1 ? "Inv " : "Fwd ")
 91       << Desc_datatype<I>::value() << "-"
 92       << Desc_datatype<O>::value() << " "
 93       << (rm == vsip::by_reference ? "by_ref " : "by_val ")
 94       << dom[0].size();
 95    if (D == 2)
 96       st << "x" << dom[1].size();
 97
 98    return st.str();
 99  } 
100};
101
102} // namespace fft
103
104
105namespace signal_detail
106{
107
108template <dimension_type D,
109          typename T>
110struct Op_count_conv
111{ 
112  static length_type value(Length<D> const& len_output, 
113    Length<D> const& len_kernel)
114  {
115    length_type   M =  len_kernel[0];
116    if (D == 2) M *= len_kernel[1];
117
118    length_type   P =  len_output[0];
119    if (D == 2) P *= len_output[1];
120
121    return M * P * (Ops_info<T>::mul + Ops_info<T>::add);
122  }
123};
124
125
126template <dimension_type D,
127          typename T>
128struct Op_count_corr : Op_count_conv<D, T>
129{};
130
131
132template <typename T>
133struct Op_count_fir
134{ 
135  static length_type value(length_type order, length_type size, 
136    length_type decimation)
137  {
138    return (Ops_info<T>::mul + Ops_info<T>::add) *
139      ((order + 1) * size / decimation);
140  } 
141};
142
143template <typename T>
144struct Op_count_iir
145{ 
146  static length_type value(length_type input_size, length_type kernel_size)
147  {
148    return ( input_size * kernel_size *
149      (5 * Ops_info<T>::mul + 4 * Ops_info<T>::add) );
150  }
151};
152
153
154template <dimension_type D, typename T>
155struct Description
156{ 
157  static std::string tag(const char* op, length_type size)
158  {
159    std::ostringstream   st;
160    st << op << " " << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " " << size;
161
162    return st.str();
163  } 
164
165  static std::string tag(const char* op, Length<D> const& len_output, 
166    Length<D> const& len_kernel)
167  {
168    std::ostringstream   st;
169    st << op << " " 
170       << D << "D "
171       << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " ";
172
173    st << len_kernel[0];
174    if (D == 2) 
175      st << "x" << len_kernel[1] << " ";
176
177    st << len_output[0];
178    if (D == 2) 
179      st << "x" << len_output[1];
180
181    return st.str();
182  } 
183};
184
185} // namespace signal_detail
186
187
188namespace matvec
189{
190template <typename T>
191struct Op_count_dot
192{ 
193  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len)
194  {
195    length_type count = len[0] * Ops_info<T>::mul;
196    if ( len[0] > 1 )
197      count += (len[0] - 1) * Ops_info<T>::add;
198    return  count;
199  } 
200};
201
202template <typename T>
203struct Op_count_cvjdot
204{ 
205  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len)
206  {
207    length_type count = len[0] * Ops_info<T>::mul;
208    if ( len[0] > 1 )
209      count += (len[0] - 1) * Ops_info<T>::add;
210    return  count;
211  } 
212};
213
214template <typename T>
215struct Op_count_cvjdot<std::complex<T> >
216{ 
217  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len)
218  {
219    // The conjugate of the second vector adds a scalar multiplication 
220    // to the total.
221    length_type count = len[0] * Ops_info<std::complex<T> >::mul +
222      len[0] * Ops_info<T>::mul;
223    if ( len[0] > 1 )
224      count += (len[0] - 1) * Ops_info<std::complex<T> >::add;
225    return  count;
226  } 
227};
228
229template <typename CT>
230struct Op_count_herm
231{ 
232  static length_type value(Length<2> const& len)
233  {
234    // The complex conjugate equals one scalar multiply
235    typedef typename impl::Scalar_of<CT>::type T;
236    return len[0] * len[1] * Ops_info<T>::mul;
237  } 
238};
239  
240template <dimension_type D,
241          typename T>
242struct Op_count_kron
243{ 
244  static length_type value(Length<D> const& len_v, Length<D> const& len_w)
245  {
246    length_type r_size = len_v[0] * len_w[0];
247    if ( D == 2 )
248      r_size *= len_v[1] * len_w[1];
249
250    return r_size * 2 * Ops_info<T>::mul;
251  } 
252};
253
254template <typename T>
255struct Op_count_outer
256{ 
257  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len_v, Length<1> const& len_w)
258  {
259    // Each element is scaled by alpha, resulting in the factor of 2.
260    return len_v[0] * len_w[0] * 2 * Ops_info<T>::mul;
261  } 
262};
263
264template <typename T>
265struct Op_count_outer<std::complex<T> >
266{ 
267  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len_v, Length<1> const& len_w)
268  {
269    // The conjugate of the second vector is needed (once), adding a 
270    // scalar multiplication to the total.
271    return len_v[0] * len_w[0] * 2 * Ops_info<std::complex<T> >::mul +
272      len_w[0] * Ops_info<T>::mul;
273  } 
274};
275
276template <typename T>
277struct Op_count_gemp
278{ 
279  static length_type value(Length<2> const& len_a, Length<2> const& len_b, 
280    mat_op_type op_a, mat_op_type op_b)
281  {
282    length_type r_size = len_a[0] * len_b[1];
283    Length<1> len_r(len_a[1]);
284
285    length_type mul_ops = Op_count_dot<T>::value(len_r) * r_size;
286
287    if ( op_a == mat_herm || op_a == mat_conj )
288      mul_ops += Ops_info<Scalar_of<T> >::mul * len_a[0] * len_a[1];
289    if ( op_b == mat_herm || op_b == mat_conj )
290      mul_ops += Ops_info<Scalar_of<T> >::mul * len_b[0] * len_b[1];
291
292    // C = alpha * OpA(A) * OpB(B) + beta * C
293    return r_size * (2 * Ops_info<T>::mul + Ops_info<T>::add) + mul_ops;
294  } 
295};
296
297template <typename T>
298struct Op_count_gems
299{ 
300  static length_type value(Length<2> const& len_a, mat_op_type op_a)
301  {
302    length_type r_size = len_a[0] * len_a[1];
303
304    length_type mat_ops = 0;
305    if ( op_a == mat_herm || op_a == mat_conj )
306      mat_ops += r_size * Ops_info<Scalar_of<T> >::mul;
307
308    // C = alpha * OpA(A) + beta * C
309    return r_size * (2 * Ops_info<T>::mul + Ops_info<T>::add) + mat_ops;
310  } 
311};
312
313template <dimension_type D,
314          typename T>
315struct Op_count_cumsum
316{ 
317  static length_type value(Length<D> const &len_v)
318  {
319    length_type adds = 0;
320    if ( len_v[0] > 1 )
321      adds += (len_v[0] - 1) * len_v[0] / 2;
322    if ( D == 2 )
323      if ( len_v[1] > 1 )
324        adds += (len_v[1] - 1) * len_v[1] / 2;
325
326    return adds * Ops_info<T>::add;
327  } 
328};
329
330template <typename T>
331struct Op_count_modulate
332{ 
333  static length_type value(Length<1> const& len_v)
334  {
335    // w(i) = v(i) * exp(0, i * nu + phi)
336    typedef std::complex<Scalar_of<T> >  CT;
337    
338    return len_v[0] * Ops_info<T>::mul + Ops_info<T>::add +
339      Ops_info<CT>::mul + Ops_info<CT>::add;
340  } 
341};
342
343  
344template <typename T>
345struct Description
346{ 
347  static std::string tag(const char* op, Length<1> const& len)
348  {
349    std::ostringstream   st;
350    st << op << " " << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " " << len[0];
351
352    return st.str();
353  } 
354
355  static std::string tag(const char* op, Length<2> const& len)
356  {
357    std::ostringstream   st;
358    st << op << " " << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " " 
359       << len[0] << "x" << len[1];
360
361    return st.str();
362  } 
363
364  static std::string tag(const char* op, Length<1> const& len_v, 
365    Length<1> const& len_w)
366  {
367    std::ostringstream   st;
368    st << op << " " << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " "
369       << len_v[0] << " " << len_w[0];
370
371    return st.str();
372  } 
373
374  static std::string tag(const char* op, Length<2> const& len_v, 
375    Length<2> const& len_w)
376  {
377    std::ostringstream   st;
378    st << op << " " << Desc_datatype<T>::value() << " "
379       << len_v[0] << "x" << len_v[1] << " "
380       << len_w[0] << "x" << len_w[1];
381
382    return st.str();
383  } 
384};
385} // namespace matvec
386
387
388} // namespace impl
389} // namespace vsip
